model

Class BoardDynamic

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board
      • model.BoardDynamic

  • public class BoardDynamic
extends Board
    Dynamic board, the board extends itself if the board is too small.
    Author:
    Ali Arfan, Kent Erlend Knudsen, Stian Tornholm Grimsgaard

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardDynamic

        public BoardDynamic(int columns,
                    int rows)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        BoardDynamic 
         public BoardDynamic(int columns, int rows)

        Sets the columns and rows according to the parameters, if they are greater than 1. Also creates a new gameboard.

        Parameters:
        columns - - the columns to be set.
        rows - - the rows to be set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - If the columns and rows are negative.
